EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-9-14_NonMQL_Exec_Analysts.ES-2018-9-14_NonMQL_Exec_Analysts
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Deliver Greater Innovation at a Lower Cost
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/request-a-demo]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I’ve been speaking with IT Leaders like you about the ways they are migrating their on-premise workloads to AWS & Azure while consolidating their on-premises footprint. What has become clear is this problem is beyond human scale.
Turbonomic's Workload Automation solution for Hybrid Cloud enables our 2000+ customers to reduce the cost, risk, and complexity associated with the migration and consolidation.
Our agnostic platform (supports VMware, AWS, Azure, etc.) provides ongoing optimization both on-premise and once workloads are in the cloud to ensure you’re only paying for what you consume.
For a bit more context, please see the resources below:
- Migrate to Microsoft Azure in 7 Days with Turbonomic <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-for-azure-migrations/7-days-to-azure]]> - AWS or Azure? How Turbonomic Enables Data-Driven Decisions <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-and-aws/which-cloud-webinar-v-1]]> - The Forrester Wave TM: Cloud Cost Monitoring and Optimization, Q2 2018 <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/analyst-reports/turbonomic-boosts-ri-support]]>
I hope you find this information helpful as you continue your cloud migration journey.
- Andrew
